name: Text
description: A reusable text component that supports different styles and HTML tags.

children.description: The text or elements to be displayed within the Text component.

variant.description: Defines the HTML tag to be used (e.g., 'p', 'span', 'h1', etc.).

color.description: Specifies the color of the text.

fontSize.description: Specifies the font size of the text.

fontWeight.description: Specifies the font weight of the text.

examples.description: Displays a heading text with custom color and font size.
